description: Unique code identifying the warehouse, stockroom, or service truck location in the fleet inventory system.
Human-readable name/description of the warehouse or mobile storeroom.
Free-text notes about the warehouse/site (instructions, special handling, status).
Default sales/use tax rate applied to purchases or transactions processed for this warehouse/site.
Prefix used to generate inventory transaction numbers for this warehouse (e.g., issues, receipts).
Last sequential number issued for inventory transactions at this warehouse; used to determine the next number.
Flag indicating whether inventory levels are actively controlled for this warehouse (Y/N).
Primary email address for the warehouse/site or its main contact.
Internal site identifier for the warehouse location; likely ties to a site master; confirm with SME.
Name or address text for the physical warehouse/site location.
Primary telephone number for the warehouse/site.
Fax number for the warehouse/site.
Prefix used to generate order numbers associated with this warehouse (e.g., stock orders, purchase requests).
Last sequential number issued for orders associated with this warehouse; used to generate the next order number.
Primary contact person or role for the warehouse, optionally with phone details.
Flag indicating whether the location is a customer or consignment warehouse (Y/N); confirm with SME.
Reference key to the address record for this warehouse/site; likely links to an address master; confirm with SME.
User or process that created the warehouse record.
Timestamp when the warehouse record was created.
User who last modified the warehouse record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the warehouse record.
Flag indicating whether inventory reservations are enforced or tracked for this warehouse (Y/N); confirm with SME.
Geospatial geometry for the warehouse location used for mapping and spatial analysis; confirm data type.
Flag indicating whether tax is included when calculating average inventory cost for this warehouse.
